name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InboxCRM - Personal CRM for Gmail by PandaDoc

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage deals and create a custom pipeline without leaving your inbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track your sales pipeline within Gmail — free!

⭐⭐⭐InboxCRM - FREE Personal CRM for Gmail
InboxCRM is built by PandaDoc — the world’s #1 proposal software for sales teams*
* As seen on G2 - https://www.g2.com/categories/proposal#grid

Why flip between your inbox and sales tools when you can set up your ideal workflow within Gmail? Forget complex set-ups — now you can create custom pipelines for sales, fundraising, hiring, and other areas of your growing business.

✅Designed for your inbox
Upgrade your Gmail interface to a custom CRM. Manage all your deals within Gmail and create a custom pipeline that reflects your sales cycle.

✅Keep it simple with the CRM essentials
Built with simplicity and usability in mind, InboxCRM is the solution for individual contributors, small teams, and startup founders.

✅Use it all across your business
Whether you’re selling, hiring, fundraising, managing projects, or working in support, InboxCRM is built to help you work more efficiently.

Top features:
Track multiple pipelines
Create unlimited deals from your inbox
Store all relevant information
Leave notes
Always completely free to use!
